Articles.Content:
Hey guys, the Kerbal Intelligence Agency has detected new threats that may undermine the freedom of all Kerbals in the United States of Kerbin.

The threat is detailed under point 3 of this intelligence report: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/239-KerbalKon-Announce

In order to counter this threat, Kerbal politicians have ordered the construction of a new air superiority fighter to safeguard the skies.

I'm not much of a missile builder, so I'm asking if anyone has a nice, compact, air to air missile design that they'd be willing to share?

Thanks.

The best that I use for stock parts is a radial decoupler. On either side of the decoupler, I put angled sepatrons to give it spin. You might need to tweak and angle the radial's mount in order for a proper forward firing, but I have had good success with emulating the missiles.

Here is a missile vehicle I did a while ago. I have a couple videos that show my missile usage. This second one was a music vid I did, but youtube copyright deleted audio. Cause of that, I said foo on it and deleted.

Wrong section, should be in <strike>Challenges forum</strike> spacecraft exchange.

Edited December 28, 2013 by spudcosmic
